description: Man City: We're Not Really Here podcast - Community Shield preview
title: Man City: We're Not Really Here podcast
title_page: Man City: We're Not Really Here podcast - Community Shield preview - BBC Sport
maintext:
As Manchester City face Arsenal in Sunday's Community Shield, BBC Radio Manchester's We're Not Really Here podcast have been discussing the importance of winning the trophy.
City's Xtra's Lewis Brown wants City to pile trophies up under Pep Guardiola and has defended the fixture: "I like the Community Shield, I think it gets too much disrespect.
"Are you telling me you're happy for Arsenal to beat City? No, I want City to win, I want them to lift the trophy."
